attributes.action: GIVE A PUBLIC UNDERTAKING that the Wanless Inquiry will not end up being another Hutton or Leveson Inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: It is common knowledge and oft reported that both Hutton and Leveson ignored calls from high level legal sources to include topics which were then declared by both of them to be 'irrelevant ', confirming in many previously open minds that both were government organised stitch ups.  The Wanless Inquiry is looking into criminal activity by politicians and other publicly prominent individuals who have received solid protection from prosecution by the Westminster Establishment and WE THE PUBLIC deserve a public assurance from our Prime Minister THAT THERE WILL BE NO POLITICAL INTERFERENCE WITH THE INQUIRY.
